entities.description: A specific category of activity performed by an officer, such as responding to a disturbance or investigating an issue.
The raw count of occurrences for a specific activity type performed by officers.
The total number of cases reported.
The percentage representation of each activity type out of the total cases.

relationships.description: Denotes the raw frequency count for each type of officer activity.
Indicates that the unweighted frequency of each activity type contributes to the total number of cases reported.
Shows the proportion of each activity type as a percentage of the total cases.
